rows.label: qst400302_msg0002
rows.name:
Tora is here to buy a
Perfect Range Sensor and
some Bion Connectors, mo!

rows.label: qst400302_msg0003
rows.name:
Ah... you're the Nopon who
was staring at them so
intently the other day.

rows.label: qst400302_msg0005
rows.name:
You were staring for
three hours straight...

rows.label: qst400302_msg0006
rows.name:
But I'm afraid to say we're
out of Perfect Range Sensors.

rows.label: qst400302_msg0007
rows.name:
Bion Connectors are 4,000G each.
We have plenty of those in stock.

rows.label: qst400302_msg0008
rows.name:
12,000G for three... That
really is quite expensive.

rows.label: qst400302_msg0009
rows.name: Boss promised he'd pay for it all, mo?

rows.label: qst400302_msg0010
rows.name:
Yes, that's true, but...
Still, what should I do?

rows.label: qst400302_msg0012
rows.name:
That's right. I may not look
it, but I'm a professional.

rows.label: qst400302_msg0013
rows.name:
In that case, you could just
salvage the Bion Connectors.

rows.label: qst400302_msg0014
rows.name:
I hear they're easier to
find this time of year.

rows.label: qst400302_msg0018
rows.name: I'll do my best to cheer you on!
